mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.room_participant_no FROM ( SELECT proom.board_name, proom.board_no, roommaker_id, room_title, room_content, proom.room_startdate, proom.room_enddate, proom.room_pwd, count.room_no, room_participant_count FROM proom, (SELECT COUNT(*) room_participant_count, room_no FROM proommember GROUP BY room_no) count WHERE proom.room_no = count.room_no AND proom.board_name = #{board_name} AND proom.board_no = #{board_no}) a LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM proommember WHERE room_participant_no = #{login_member_no}) b ON a.room_no= b.room_no
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM proom WHERE board_name = #{board_name} AND board_no = #{board_no} AND room_no = #{room_no} AND room_pwd = md5(#{room_pwd})
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM proommember WHERE room_no = #{room_no} AND room_participant_no = #{room_participant_no}
